property.name: Text
property.value: When you confront this card's Problem, turn this card over.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you play a card during a faceoff, you may exhaust this card to score a point.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you confront this card's Problem, turn this card over.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of a faceoff, you may exhaust this card to have an opponent discard a card. If they do, one of your cards involved in the faceoff gets +X power until the end of the faceoff, where X is the discarded card's power.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you confront this card's Problem, turn this card over.

property.name: Text
property.value: While you have a Friend with higher power than its cost, this card has +2 power. Immediate: Pay [3] to double this card's power until the end of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you win a faceoff involving this card, score a point.

property.name: Text
property.value: Chaos: While this card is flipped, it has +2 power. Harmony Griffon: When this or another one of your Griffon Friends enters play, that card gets Competitive 2 until the end of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, you may move one of your characters.

property.name: Text
property.value: Harmony Pegasus: When this or another one of your Pegasus Friends enters play, you may move this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Harmony Earth Pony: When this or another one of your Earth Pony Friends enters play, an opposing Friend loses and can't have abilities until the end of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, you may exhaust an opposing character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your Friends with +1 power counters on them can't be frightened.

property.name: Text
property.value: Opponents can't ready more than one character during their Ready Step. Harmony Dragon: When this card enters play, exhaust an opposing character for each Dragon character you have.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immediate: Exhaust this card to give a Troublemaker here Competitive 4 until the end of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Harmony Dragon: While you have another Dragon character, this card gets +2 power.

property.name: Text
property.value: Harmony Griffon: When this card enters play, reveal a card from the top of your deck for each of your Griffon characters. Choose up to one of those cards and put it on top of your deck, then put the rest on the bottom of your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Harmony Griffon: You pay [1] less to play your first Griffon Friend each turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Harmony Earth Pony: This card has Eccentric 1 for each of your other Earth Pony characters.

property.name: Text
property.value: Agile Harmony Griffon: When this card enters play, you may dismiss an opposing Friend with cost less than or equal to the number of Griffon characters you have.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, you may look at the top two cards of a Problem deck and put them back on the top or bottom of that deck in any order.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you play this card, you may put the top card of a Problem deck into play as a Dilemma. (It enters play at its own area; this does not replace any Problems already in play.).

property.name: Text
property.value: Harmony Dragon: Your Troublemakers here have +1 power for each of your Dragon characters.

property.name: Text
property.value: Harmony Alicorn: You pay [2] less to play your first Alicorn Friend each turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, you may put an opposing Friend on top of its owner's deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Harmony Dragon: At the start of a faceoff here, if you have another Dragon character, you may move an opposing character.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, you may put a Troublemaker from your hand into play face-up.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immediate: Exhaust this card to gain [1].

property.name: Text
property.value: Harmony Unicorn: When this or another one of your Unicorn Friends enters play, you may pay [1] less for your next Event this turn to a minimum of [1].

property.name: Text
property.value: Chaos: When you flip this card, you may put a Resource from your discard pile into your hand. When this card enters play, you may pay [1] less for your next Resource this turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you move a character, this card gets +1 power until the end of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Harmony Changeling: When this or another one of your Changeling Friends enters play, double this card's power until the end of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Harmony Changeling: When you play this card, gain control of an opposing Friend with cost less than or equal to the number of Changeling characters you have.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, put a token copy of a Resource into play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Harmony Unicorn: Main Phase: Exhaust this card to give one of your Unicorn characters +1 power for each Event in your discard pile until the end of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, give another character +2 power until the end of the turn. Harmony Changeling: When this card enters play, if you have another Changeling character, this card gets +2 power until the end of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: If this card would be sent home, it is sent to another Problem instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Harmony Pegasus: Your other Pegasus Friends have Persistent.

property.name: Text
property.value: This card can't contribute its power to faceoffs.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play and at the start of each of your turns, choose one: This card has Swift until the start of your next turn, or this card has Calming 2 until the start of your next turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Chaos: When this card is flipped, you may put it into play. Harmony Changeling: If you would put any number of flipped Changeling Friends on the bottom of your deck, you may put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, you may dismiss a Resource. Harmony Pegasus: While you have another Pegasus character, this card has Swift.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, you may turn a Troublemaker face-down.

property.name: Text
property.value: Swift When you confront this card's Problem, you may put an opposing Friend with 3 or more power into its owner's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you confront this card's Problem, you may exhaust an opposing character here.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immediate: Pay [1] to give this card +2 power until the end of the turn. This card can't be frightened.

property.name: Text
property.value: Harmony Griffon: When you move a Griffon character, you may draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Competitive 2 When you win a faceoff involving this card, you may look at the top card of a Problem deck and put it on the top or bottom of that deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you confront this card's Problem, gain [1].

property.name: Text
property.value: Your other characters here have +1 power. Immediate: Exhaust this card to pay [1] less for your next Friend this turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Harmony Pegasus: Your other Pegasus characters have +1 power.

property.name: Text
property.value: Harmony Earth Pony: When this card enters play, you may start a faceoff involving this card and an opposing character. If you win, draw a card for each of your Earth Ponies.

property.name: Text
property.value: Chaos: While this card is flipped, it has power equal to the number of cards in your hand. Stubborn Main Phase: Exhaust this card to draw a card. This card's power is equal to the number of cards in your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Pay [1] and exhaust this card to frighten a Friend. Harmony Dragon: When this card readies, you may put a +1 power counter on a Dragon Friend.

property.name: Text
property.value: Stubborn At the start of a Troublemaker faceoff, you may exhaust this card to have it become involved in the faceoff.

property.name: Text
property.value: This card has +1 power for each card type among cards in your discard pile. Opposing characters here can't contribute their power to confronting this card's Problem unless their power is greater than or equal to this card's power.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Exhaust this card and discard a card to reduce a Problem's confront requirements by 2 power until the end of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you confront this card's Problem, an opponent discards a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Eccentric 2 When this card enters play, draw 2 cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: When an opposing character enters play here, you may draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: As this card enters play, banish an opposing Friend. This card enters play as a copy of that Friend.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you move this card, you may turn a Troublemaker face-down.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, you may banish a Friend, Resource, or Troublemaker.

property.name: Text
property.value: Harmony Unicorn: When this or another one of your Unicorn Friends enters play, choose an Event in your discard pile. Until the end of the turn, you may play that Event as though it were in your hand. If you do and it would enter your discard pile, banish it instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you move this card, you may pay [1] to move an opposing character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Harmony Changeling: When you confront this card's Problem, if you have 2 or more other Changeling characters here, score an additional point.

property.name: Text
property.value: This card has Swift while you have a [Loyalty] character, Diligent 2 while you have an [Honesty] character, Eccentric 2 while you have a [Laughter] character, Meticulous 2 while you have a [Magic] character, Showy 2 while you have a [Generosity] character, and Agile while you have a [Kindness] character.

property.name: Text
property.value: As this card enters play, choose up to two colors. This card has those colors.

property.name: Text
property.value: Players can't play cards, activate abilities, or take actions except as a Main Phase action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immediate: One of your characters gets Competitive 2 until the end of the turn. Harmony Pegasus: For each of your Pegasus characters, that character gets an additional Competitive 1 until the end of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immediate: Move one of your characters. Harmony Changeling: Your Changeling characters have Agile until the end of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Put an opposing Friend on top of its owner's deck. Harmony Unicorn: If that Friend's cost is less than or equal to the number of Unicorn characters you have, gain [1].

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Choose one: Move up to three of your characters, an opponent retires a random Friend, or banish a Troublemaker.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Reveal a card from the top of your deck, then reveal an additional card for each of your Dragon characters. Choose one: put a revealed Troublemaker into play face-up, or put a revealed card into your hand. Then, put the remaining cards on the top or bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Banish an opposing Resource. Harmony Unicorn: If you have a Unicorn character, that Resource's controller reveals their hand and you banish each card in it with the same name as that Resource.

property.name: Text
property.value: Chaos: When you flip this card, draw a card. Immediate: Draw 3 cards. Harmony Griffon: Give one of your Griffon characters Eccentric 1 for each card in your hand until the end of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immediate: Until the end of the turn, your characters get +3 power and opponents can't play cards during faceoffs.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: One of your characters gets +2 power until the end of the turn. <> Harmony Earth Pony: If that character is an Earth Pony, it gets +4 power until the end of the turn instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Chaos: When this card is flipped, flip an additional card. Immediate: During a faceoff, flip an additional card. Harmony Dragon: Flip another additional card if you have a Dragon character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immediate: Send a character that was moved this turn to its previous area. Harmony Unicorn: If you have 3 or more Unicorn characters, opponents can't move characters until the end of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immediate: Discard all the cards in your hand, then draw 6 cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Dismiss an opposing Friend. Harmony Earth Pony: Dismiss another opposing Friend with cost less than or equal to the number of Earth Pony characters you have.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immediate: Frighten a Friend with 2 or less power. Harmony Griffon: When you play a Griffon Friend while this card is in your discard pile, you may banish this card to frighten a Friend with 2 or less power.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Dismiss each face-up and face-down Troublemaker, then you may replace a Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Start a faceoff involving one of your characters and an opposing Friend or Troublemaker. If you win, banish that opposing card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immediate: Put an opposing Friend with 2 or less power into its owner's hand. Harmony Pegasus: If you have a Pegasus character, put an opposing Friend into its owner's hand instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immediate: Turn each character, face-up Troublemaker, and face-down Troublemaker over. At the start of the next turn, turn each character, face-up Troublemaker, and face-down Troublemaker over again.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Choose one: An opponent discards 2 random cards, move up to three opposing characters, or Troublemakers don't prevent you from confronting Problems until the end of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to your home. You have +4 power during Troublemaker faceoffs.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on a Friend with cost 2 or less. When you play this card, put a token copy of that Friend into play. When you move the attached Friend, you may move a token Friend with the same name.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to your home. At the end of each opponent's turn, that player loses [1]. When an opponent loses one or more action tokens, you may exhaust this card to gain [1].

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to your home. Mane Characters can't be involved in faceoffs.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to your home. Main Phase: Exhaust this card and pay [2] to exchange control of this card and an opposing Resource. If you do, this card does not ready during its controller's next Ready Phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to your home. Main Phase: Pay [1] to move a character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on a Friend That Friend has +2 power. Harmony Changeling: If that Friend is a Changeling, it has +4 power instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to your home. Main Phase: Exhaust this card to put a +1 power counter on a Friend.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, you may dismiss a Troublemaker. Troublemakers can't be played here.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to your home. Players can't search decks or look at cards in decks. Cards can't leave discard piles.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to your home. When this card enters play, draw a card and banish a card from your hand. At the start of your turn, put a Study counter on this card. Immediate: Remove three Study counters from this card to retire it. If you do, you may play the banished card without paying its cost until the end of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, choose a color. The play requirements of your cards are reduced by 2 of the chosen color. If you would discard a card while this card is in your hand, you may put this card into play instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, you may pay [2] less for your next Friend this turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: This card has -1 power for each different Trait among opposing characters here.

property.name: Text
property.value: When an opponent challenges this card, that player retires a Friend involved in the faceoff.

property.name: Text
property.value: This card can't be challenged except by two or more characters.

property.name: Text
property.value: Double this card's power for each other Pukwudgie in play.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card is uncovered, you may pay [3] to dismiss an opposing Friend.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of each opponent's turn, choose a card from your hand. That opponent guesses its card type, and you reveal the chosen card. If that opponent guessed correctly, this card does not prevent them from confronting its Problem this turn and can't be challenged until the end of the turn. Otherwise, this card's power is doubled until the end of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immediate: Banish a Troublemaker from your discard pile to give a Troublemaker here +2 power until the end of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Opposing characters here with the highest power among opposing characters can't contribute their power to confronting this Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: Characters here with power less than or equal to their printed power can't contribute their power to faceoffs.

property.name: Text
property.value: Opposing Troublemakers don't prevent you from confronting this Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, you may look at the top 3 cards of your deck and put them back on the top or bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of the game, you may draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the end of your turn, if you have a character with the highest power, draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immediate: While this card is at a Problem with 2 or more other characters, turn this card over.

property.name: Text
property.value: Eccentric 2 When you confront this card's Problem, you may exhaust this card to draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Agile When you move this card, you may pay [1] to frighten a Friend.

property.name: Text
property.value: This card can't be frightened. At the start of your turn, if there is another character with higher power than this card, put a number of +1 power counters on this card equal to this card's power.

property.name: Text
property.value: Opponents play with their hands revealed. When this card enters play, name a card type. When an opponent draws a card with the named type, you may draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of your turn, reveal the top three cards of your deck. Put one into your hand and the rest on the top or bottom of your deck in any order. If you would put a flipped Event on the bottom of your deck, you may exhaust this card to put that Event into your hand instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you play this card, each player may put a card from their discard pile into their hand. For each card put into a player's hand this way, score a point. Main Phase: While this card is in your discard pile, you may pay [2] and put it into your hand to put the top three cards of each player's deck into that player's discard pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, dismiss each opposing Resource and Troublemaker.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may pay [1] less to play Friends, to a minimum of [1]. Opponents pay +[2] to play Events. When an opponent plays a card, you may draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your other characters have +2 power. Your Friends can't be frightened. If one of your Friends would leave play, you may pay [2] and exhaust this card to banish that Friend until the end of the turn instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Put each Friend, Resource, and Troublemaker on top of its owner's deck, then each player shuffles their discard pile into their deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card is defeated, you may reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal a Friend. If you do, put that Friend into play, then shuffle your deck.
